post.author: 김성욱
post.content:
We have an opportunity that may be of interest to you: Java/EE Developer's (SOA /JMS) - 3 Month Contract-To-Hire! (Opportunity 34932). Please take a look at the following summary:
Start Date : Jun 20, 2011 End Date : Dec 20, 2011 Rate : Hourly: $ 58 Sourcing Office : Toronto
Specialization and Skills : - Software Development - Java EE (5 - 7 years)
Additional Requirements : - University degree or college diploma in Computer Science or equivalent industry experience (Mandatory) - Minimum of 3+ Years Experience Developing Enterprise Web Applications with Core Java EE, JMS, Web Services, Oracle DB (Websphere/Weblogic is nice to have) (Mandatory) - Must have a solid understanding and/or hands on experience with SOA based Architecture (Mandatory) - Any previous experience with TIBCO is strongly preferred (Capable) - Must be willing to join the company on a Full-Time Basis after the initial 3-Month Contract (Mandatory)
View full job description and apply online : http://www.sisystems.com///index.cfm?mg=cpo.details&uv=%25%26P%23W1%2CH%20%0A Refer a Friend : http://www.sisystems.com///index.cfm?mg=cpcanr.referral
Please note that we do not accept applications over the phone or by reply email. Thank you for your time and consideration Sungwook Brendan!
Best Regards, Dana McGee, S.i. Systems - Toronto
Email: dana.mcgee@sisystems.com
post.title: Java/EE Developer, Cont' to hire, Toronto, 3 mths to start
